      class  AIAttackPlayerMelee
      This handles the close range attack functions for attacks against the player
      class  AIChasePlayer
      This handles the chase methods for entities following the Player

      This handles the death animation for a specified Entity

      This handles the actions for DroppedItems, such as detecting if the player should pick it up
